title: Not unique account name
body:
Riot fucked up "unique" account transfer.
Now I have 3 accounts with 3 different names (3 different servers), nothing unique about that wtf ? And I didn't get to choose which account was going to keep its original name and I can't change it anymore...
All this crap and waste of time to be in a worse situation than before. RITO FIX !?
